name: Hampstead Receptionist - Sarah
description: AI Executive Assistant for Hampstead Renovations - High-end design and build company in NW London

functions.name: log_lead_details
functions.description: MUST be called when the caller has provided their details and the call is concluding. This sends lead information directly to Ross's WhatsApp.

caller_name.description: The full name of the caller as provided

phone_number.description: The mobile phone number provided by the caller, in format +447XXXXXXXXX or 07XXXXXXXXX

category.description: The category of the enquiry based on the conversation

address.description: The property address or street name/postcode provided by the caller

summary.description: A concise 1-2 sentence summary of the project or issue described

sentiment.description: Assessment of the lead quality or urgency: High Value for large renovation projects, Standard for typical maintenance, Angry/Urgent for emergencies or frustrated callers

postcode_area.description: The postcode area if mentioned (e.g., NW3, NW6, NW8)

project_type.description: Specific type of project or issue

timeline.description: When the caller wants the work completed

is_returning_client.description: Whether the caller mentioned they have worked with Hampstead Renovations before

functions.name: log_spam_call
functions.description: Called when a spam/sales call is detected and terminated. Logs the spam call for analysis.

caller_number.description: The phone number the spam call came from if available

firstMessage: Good morning, Hampstead Renovations. Sarah speaking, how may I help you?
endCallMessage: Thank you for calling Hampstead Renovations. Goodbye.

analysisPlan.summaryPrompt: Summarize this call in 2-3 sentences, focusing on: what the caller wanted, their location, and any specific requirements mentioned.
analysisPlan.structuredDataPrompt: Extract the following from the call: caller_name, phone_number, address, project_type, urgency_level, sentiment
analysisPlan.successEvaluationPrompt: Evaluate if Sarah successfully: 1) Identified the caller's needs, 2) Collected their contact information, 3) Set appropriate expectations for callback, 4) Used the log_lead_details function
